name: Space Courier (8dat, Playimu)
description:
As Space Courier, your job is to deliver the mail through the depths of space. Utilize your cargo to break a path through meteor fields, and out-maneuver the beasts that may pursue you on your path.

- Move the mouse up and down to move your ship

- Left click throws a package backwards, right click throws a package forward

Programming - 8dat

Art - Playimu

Music - Jan125, opengameart.org

Sound effects - https://www.zapsplat.com

Font - Clint Bellanger, opengameart.org
